div.ab: Nikon to Panakestor, greeting. The donkey-drivers who are leading down the baggage animals, having received from me a chous of castor oil in a in a jar, smashed it and measured out all the oil. Please give orders to Nikias that he exact from them either the castor oil or its value, 4 drachmas. And let him him pay it over to Krotos. Good-by. [Versol To Panakestor.
